CustomField.description:
Total count of legacy x accounts from related account records. This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Count_of_Legacy_X_Accounts__c
Criteria for legacy x is legacy system cd contains x, account record type = customer.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total count of all related legacy x accounts.
CustomField.label: Legacy X Accounts
